"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "appointment_no", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Appointment No."}, {"fieldname": "patient_id", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Patient Id"}, {"fieldname": "phone", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Phone"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "patient_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Patient Name"}, {"fieldname": "doctor_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Doctor Name"}, {"fieldname": "age", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Age"}, {"fieldname": "weight", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Weight"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "report", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Report", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "visit_date", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "symptoms", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "diagnosis", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "prescription", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "medical_examination_findings", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "duration", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "advice", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldname": "lab_tests", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Lab Tests", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "lab_tests", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}]}]
html:
Patient Name: {{ patient_name }}
Patient ID: {{ patient_id }}
Doctor Name: {{ doctor_name }}
Phone: {{ phone }}
Age: {{ age }}
Weight: {{ weight }}
Report: {% for report_entry in report %}
Visit Date: {{ report_entry.visit_date }}
Symptoms: {{ report_entry.symptoms }}
Diagnosis: {{ report_entry.diagnosis }}
Prescription: {{ report_entry.prescription }}
Medical Examination Findings: {{ report_entry.medical_examination_findings }}
Duration: {{ report_entry.duration }}
Advice: {{ report_entry.advice }}

{% endfor %}
Lab Tests: {% for lab_test in lab_tests %}
- {{ lab_test.lab_tests }}
{% endfor %}
name: check patient 1
